description:
Fantasy Football â€“ How to Play and How to Win is the first Udemy course that teaches you how to play the complex and rewarding game of Fantasy Football. Through 15 lectures, more than 4 full hours of content, you'll learn the basics of playing fantasy sports and gain a thorough understanding of the strategy and management you'll need to run your franchise successfully.

Fantasy Football is a game that more than 10% of the US is actively involved in, and it is a fantastic way to earn a steady profit, year after year, if you're good. In 2014, I earned over $12,000 playing this game, and every minute of it was a joy.

You can easily learn the same skills I've used to dominate my fantasy leagues. I'll show you a sure-fire winning strategy, as well as one of the easiest types of leagues to play in. Following the strategy that is set out in this guide practically guarantees success.

I'll share all my secrets, from where to play and how to draft, to how to maintain your team throughout the year. I use real-life examples, current players and real statistics to help you float to the top of your league's standings.

Read some of the reviews below to see what others are saying. Here are some highlights:

  • "I have been playing fantasy football for many years and I learned some new ways at looking at the game and different type leagues. I highly recommend this course to anyone wanting to learn more about fantasy football or the beginner."
  • "Robert organized the course very well. His command on the subject is very good. He knows what he is talking. He provided excellent information."
  • " always wanted to play fantasy football but don't know where to start but this course definitely helps to move forward. I am waiting for the 2015 season so that I can show my skills that I learned through this course to my colleagues, friends"

Also, don't forget Udemy's 30-day money back guarantee. You have nothing to lose, except your fantasy football trophies. Enroll now!
title: Fantasy Football - How to Play, and How to Win
